ARABIC: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَٰسِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And the people of Nuh before, they were a people of deviators.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (So had We destroyed) the people of Noah before them: They were surely a sinful people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Before all these We destroyed the people of Noah: they were a wicked people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The people of Noah who lived before them were also evil doing people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And before them, We destroyed the people of Nooh; they were indeed a sinning nation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (So were) the people of Nuh before them. Verily, they were a people who were rebellious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the people of Nuh before, surely they were a transgressing people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And the people of Noah before; surely they were an ungodly people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the folk of Noah aforetime. Lo! they were licentious folk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [We destroyed] the people of Noah before them. They were certainly a sinful people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the people of Nuh We destroyed aforetime; verily they were a people transgressing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And the people of Noah aforetime. Indeed, they were a transgressing lot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So were the People of Noah before them for they wickedly transgressed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (So were) the people of Nuh (Noah) before them. Verily, they were a people who were Fasiqun (rebellious, disobedient to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And before them the nation of Noah, indeed they were a debauched nation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And before that, the people of Noah. They were immoral people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:46]   And the people of Noah (read wa qawmi Nūhin, as a supplement to Thamūda, in other words: ‘in the destruction of these [two peoples] by what [destructive power] exists in the heavens and the earth there is [also] a sign’; or read wa qawma Nūhin, in other words, ‘We also destroyed the people of Noah’) aforetime, that is, before the destruction of those mentioned. Indeed they were an immoral lot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the folk of Noah) We had also destroyed them (aforetime) before the folk of Salih. (Lo! they were licentious folk) they were disbelieving folk.
